languages.text: "Теперь очевидно, что то была лишь пешка, которую искусный игрок под меч воздаянный на доску поставил. Он знал, что ты выш{mf|ел|ла} на след, и сыграл свой размен: племени своего пожертвовал частью малой, чтобы солгать нам, что умерщвлены они все".

"One sees now that this was but a pawn, ushered into place merely to deflect the falling sword. The player knew the game was forfeit, and thus made a trade: a few of their tribe sent to the slaughter so that they might sell the lie that the foe was dead."
languages.original_text: "Теперь очевидно, что то была лишь пешка, которую искусный игрок под меч воздаянный на доску поставил. Он знал, что ты выш{mf|ел|ла} на след, и сыграл свой размен: племени своего пожертвовал частью малой, чтобы солгать нам, что умерщвлены они все".

traits.locale_text: "Now it is evident that it was but a pawn, ushered in place to thwart the falling sword. He knew the game was up, and made a trade: surrendered fraction of his tribe to lie that all were slaughtered."

"Now it is evident that it was but a pawn, ushered in place to thwart the falling sword. He knew the game was up, and made a trade: surrendered fraction of his tribe to lie that all were slaughtered."

"Now it is evident that this was but a pawn, ushered into place merely to deflect the falling sword. He knew the game was up, and thus made a trade: he sacrificed a small portion of his tribe so that he might sell the lie that they had all been slaughtered."

"Now it is evident that this was but a pawn, ushered into place merely to deflect the falling sword. He knew the game was up, and thus made a trade: he sacrificed a small portion of his tribe so that he might sell the lie that they had all been slaughtered."

"One sees now that this was but a pawn, ushered into place merely to deflect the falling sword. The player knew the game was forfeit, and thus made a trade: a few of their tribe sent to the slaughter so that they might sell the lie that the foe was dead."

"One sees now that this was but a pawn, ushered into place merely to deflect the falling sword. The player knew the game was forfeit, and thus made a trade: a few of their tribe sent to the slaughter so that they might sell the lie that the foe was dead."

languages.text: «Ahora veo que no era más que un peón, situado para desviar la espada descendente. Sabedor de que había perdido la partida, el jugador sacrificó a algunos integrantes de su tribu para vender la mentira de que el enemigo había sido exterminado».
languages.original_text: "One sees now that this was but a pawn, ushered into place merely to deflect the falling sword. The player knew the game was forfeit, and thus made a trade: a few of their tribe sent to the slaughter so that they might sell the lie that the foe was dead."

traits.locale_text: «Ahora veo que no era más que un peón, situado para desviar la espada descendente. Sabedor de que había perdido la partida, el jugador sacrificó a algunos integrantes de su tribu para vender la mentira de que el enemigo había sido exterminado».

languages.text: 「今なら分かるが、これは振り下ろされる剣をそらすための駒にすぎなかった。プレイヤーは手詰まりのゲームと自覚して、取引を受け入れたのだ。自分たちの部族を何名か殺りくに送り、敵は死んだという嘘を流したのさ」
languages.original_text: "One sees now that this was but a pawn, ushered into place merely to deflect the falling sword. The player knew the game was forfeit, and thus made a trade: a few of their tribe sent to the slaughter so that they might sell the lie that the foe was dead."

traits.locale_text: 「今なら分かるが、これは振り下ろされる剣をそらすための駒にすぎなかった。プレイヤーは手詰まりのゲームと自覚して、取引を受け入れたのだ。自分たちの部族を何名か殺りくに送り、敵は死んだという嘘を流したのさ」

languages.text: “事实已经很清楚，那个人不过是枚棋子，被引诱到了那个位置，用来挡住落下来的利剑。棋手明白那场对弈已经失败，于是做出了选择，把部族的一部分人送到断头台下，让对手误以为敌人已经灭亡。”
languages.original_text: "One sees now that this was but a pawn, ushered into place merely to deflect the falling sword. The player knew the game was forfeit, and thus made a trade: a few of their tribe sent to the slaughter so that they might sell the lie that the foe was dead."

traits.locale_text: “事实已经很清楚，那个人不过是枚棋子，被引诱到了那个位置，用来挡住落下来的利剑。棋手明白那场对弈已经失败，于是做出了选择，把部族的一部分人送到断头台下，让对手误以为敌人已经灭亡。”

languages.text: "Man sieht nun, dass dies nur ein Bauernopfer war, nur positioniert, um das herabsausende Schwert abzulenken. Der Spieler wusste, dass das Spiel verloren war, und ging daher einen Tauschhandel ein: Einige Mitglieder seines Stammes wurden zur Schlachtbank geführt, um die Lüge zu verkaufen, dass der Feind tot sei."
languages.original_text: "One sees now that this was but a pawn, ushered into place merely to deflect the falling sword. The player knew the game was forfeit, and thus made a trade: a few of their tribe sent to the slaughter so that they might sell the lie that the foe was dead."

traits.locale_text: "Man sieht nun, dass dies nur ein Bauernopfer war, nur positioniert, um das herabsausende Schwert abzulenken. Der Spieler wusste, dass das Spiel verloren war, und ging daher einen Tauschhandel ein: Einige Mitglieder seines Stammes wurden zur Schlachtbank geführt, um die Lüge zu verkaufen, dass der Feind tot sei."

languages.text: « Nous savons maintenant que ce n'était qu'un pion parmi d'autres, uniquement destiné à dévier l'épée qui s'abat. Conscient que la partie était perdue, le joueur a proposé d'envoyer quelques membres de sa tribu à l'abattoir pour faire croire à la mort de l'ennemi. »
languages.original_text: "One sees now that this was but a pawn, ushered into place merely to deflect the falling sword. The player knew the game was forfeit, and thus made a trade: a few of their tribe sent to the slaughter so that they might sell the lie that the foe was dead."

traits.locale_text: « Nous savons maintenant que ce n'était qu'un pion parmi d'autres, uniquement destiné à dévier l'épée qui s'abat. Conscient que la partie était perdue, le joueur a proposé d'envoyer quelques membres de sa tribu à l'abattoir pour faire croire à la mort de l'ennemi. »

languages.text: "Gözler şimdi görüyor ki o sadece düşen bir kılıcın yönünü değiştirmek için yerleştirilmiş bir piyondan ibaretti. Oyuncu, oyunu kaybettiğini bildiğinden takas yaptı. Düşmanın öldüğü yalanını inandırıcı kılabilirsin diye kabilesinden birkaçını kıyıma gönderdi."
languages.original_text: "One sees now that this was but a pawn, ushered into place merely to deflect the falling sword. The player knew the game was forfeit, and thus made a trade: a few of their tribe sent to the slaughter so that they might sell the lie that the foe was dead."
